about_the_game:
This DLC contains dozens of minutes of unreleased footage;

In order to maintain a better rhythm in the presentation of the story, we edited a large number of shots, but these shots are extremely valuable to every player who likes their favorite characters, so we carefully selected these shots and released them for everyone to enjoy;
This DLC is the final DLC update of this stage;
You can download and view the videos in this DLC, but you cannot use them for any commercial purpose;
